We are looking to hire a student for an 8 month Co- Op term. Eligible applicants should be in their second year or beyond in a business, engineering, science, or medical based field. Specifics of the opportunity include: Responsibility • Understand company solutions and customer use • Test solutions for issues, log concerns, and work with development teams to fix • Propose and develop systems to improve QA performance and efficiency Collaborate efficiently with other team members • Job Requirements Requirements • Must be actively enrolled in an accredited Canadian University or College during the co-op placement. • Experience in working with technology-based solutions, preferably physical devices and mobile applications • Completed at least the second year, and currently enrolled in an accredited Canadian University in Engineering, Comp Sci, Physics, Math, etc • Must be a Canadian Citizen or Permanent Resident Must be willing to come into our Toronto Office, 155 Queens Quay East • Good To Have • Programming experience • Prior experience in the biomedical field Self-motivated • Citizenship Requirement Canadian & Permanent Residents Only APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Quality Assurance / Test Co-op (8 Month) Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
